nodes.text: The Declorian Territory was a region of space in the Endor system.
During 1 ABY, the Zynt'aia Spice Guardians terrorized the Declorian Territory with a fierce fist. Often times, unless business was mentioned, the Spice Guardians were not open to having visitors.
In addition to the Spice Guardians, the Declorian Territory was home to Blacklight Pirates, and Alliance pilots.
